version_description:
* Customize the For You feed by following the games you love the most
* Choose whether to show HD videos when on a good network, or to always watch in SD.
* Tap the For You tab, or pull down to refresh any feed
* Tap on a #tag to open a feed of clips using that tag
* Added links to the profile drawer; settings, feedback, support, and more.
* Many bug fixes and small improvements to make your experience of watching clips smoother, and navigating in the app more predictable.

* Customize the For You feed by following the games you love the most
* Choose whether to show HD videos when on a good network, or to always watch in SD.
* Tap the For You tab, or pull down to refresh any feed
* Tap on a #tag to open a feed of clips using that tag
* Added links to the profile drawer; settings, feedback, support, and more.
* Many bug fixes and small improvements to make your experience of watching clips smoother, and navigating in the app more predictable.

- Log in screens now look a whole lot nicer for everyone using a smaller device
- Better handling of medal.tv links, so it’s easier to check out your favorite users and games in the app
- Fixes 5 sources of crashes that we noticed over the holidays

- Log in screens now look a whole lot nicer for everyone using a smaller device
- Better handling of medal.tv links, so it’s easier to check out your favorite users and games in the app
- Fixes 5 sources of crashes that we noticed over the holidays

This week's new features will help you find what you're most interested in on Medal:
- You can now search the app for games, users, tags and topics
- The new Discover page shows trending tags and topics from across the Medal platform
- We also fixed a bug with pinch-to-zoom

This week's new features will help you find what you're most interested in on Medal:
- You can now search the app for games, users, tags and topics
- The new Discover page shows trending tags and topics from across the Medal platform
- We also fixed a bug with pinch-to-zoom

- Long press on a clip to download, change default video quality and more.
- Not interested in a clip? Long press on it and tell us why - we want to show you clips you’ll love.
- If you need to report a clip or user, that’s under the long press menu too and you can now tell us exactly what’s wrong.
- Fixes one of our biggest sources of crashes that could occur while refreshing clip feeds.

- Long press on a clip to download, change default video quality and more.
- Not interested in a clip? Long press on it and tell us why - we want to show you clips you’ll love.
- If you need to report a clip or user, that’s under the long press menu too and you can now tell us exactly what’s wrong.
- Fixes one of our biggest sources of crashes that could occur while refreshing clip feeds.

- Fixed an issue where top comments could overlap clip titles
- Improved Dynamic Type support in user profiles

- Fixed an issue where top comments could overlap clip titles
- Improved Dynamic Type support in user profiles
- Fixes a rare issue where the app could crash
- Fixes a rare issue where the app could crash

- Browse Medal without an account by tapping “Continue as guest”
- You can now see which users have been tagged in a clip
- A Creator badge lets you easily see which comments were made by the clip's creator
- Fixed a bunch of bugs, and made scrolling smoother and clip looping seamless in the process

- Browse Medal without an account by tapping “Continue as guest”
- You can now see which users have been tagged in a clip
- A Creator badge lets you easily see which comments were made by the clip's creator
- Fixed a bunch of bugs, and made scrolling smoother and clip looping seamless in the process

- Jump straight into browsing Medal without an account
- Tell us if you want to see less from a user or a game in your feed - long press on a clip and tap Not Interested to see the options
- We fixed the glitchy animation in Notifications and Comments screens

- Jump straight into browsing Medal without an account
- Tell us if you want to see less from a user or a game in your feed - long press on a clip and tap Not Interested to see the options
- We fixed the glitchy animation in Notifications and Comments screens
- Fixes an issue that prevented signing in using a third party provider
- Fixes an issue that prevented signing in using a third party provider
Fixed an issue with linking to content
Fixed an issue with linking to content
Fixes an issue with opening clips from notifications in the app
Fixes an issue with opening clips from notifications in the app
